nodes.text: The Transit Hill, also known as the Riar Starport, was a hill located in the Toydarian city of Riar. It was adjacent to the Factory Hill, and all starship traffic entering the city was routed through the hill.

The starport was technically under the control of the royal Riar government, but its various bays were rented out to various businesses, which charged a variety of prices. At the base of the hill were a series of private bays, although they were considered inferior to the public facilities.
